box_shadow_vertical_tablet=”0px” box_shadow_blur_tablet=”40px” box_shadow_spread_tablet=”0px” global_colors_info=”{}”]The 5th edition of the Convergences Tunisie 3ZÉRO Forum “Sustainability and social well-being at the heart of development” provided an opportunity to deepen the thinking behind the four previous Forums for a Tunisia with a growing and sustainable economy. This unique forum provided an opportunity to equip stakeholders by offering a series of conferences and debates enabling all participants to take ownership of the country’s development challenges, while breaking down the barriers between sectors to enable everyone to become a player in a Zero Carbon, Zero Exclusion, Zero Poverty Tunisia. The fifth edition of the Forum was held on 27 November 2023 at the Cité de la Culture, thanks to the work carried out by local working groups throughout 2023.

5th EDITION – TUNISIA 3ZERO CONVERGENCES FORUM

box_shadow_vertical_tablet=”0px” box_shadow_blur_tablet=”40px” box_shadow_spread_tablet=”0px” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”]

A major event for development and SSE’s actors, following the work initiated since 2018 by Convergences Tunisia. This new Edition brought light on a crucial issues that is to readapt the economic system to the environmental and social issues in order to face the 2030 Agenda imperatives, as the economic model has to be thought at the service of the greater good. This new paradigm, collectively carried by the civil society and the institutions, is now embodied in various local initiatives on gender equality or sustainable natural ressources management.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.16″ background_color=”#ffffff” z_index_tablet=”500″ box_shadow_horizontal_tablet=”0px” box_shadow_vertical_tablet=”0px” box_shadow_blur_tablet=”40px” box_shadow_spread_tablet=”0px” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ background_color=”#ffffff” z_index_tablet=”500″ box_shadow_horizontal_tablet=”0px” box_shadow_vertical_tablet=”0px” box_shadow_blur_tablet=”40px” box_shadow_spread_tablet=”0px” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.23.1″ text_font=”Poppins||||||||” background_color=”RGBA(0,0,0,0)” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” text_orientation=”center” module_alignment=”center” use_border_color=”off” border_color=”#ffffff” border_style=”solid” global_colors_info=”{}”]

The 3Zero Tunisa Convergences Forum adressed the 3 following topics :

PARTNERS AND SUPPORTS

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.23.1″ text_font=”Poppins||||||||” text_font_size=”13px” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” text_orientation=”justified” use_border_color=”off” border_color=”#ffffff” border_style=”solid” global_colors_info=”{}”]

To organise this Forum, Convergences received support from Acted, the Heinrich Böll Stiftung Tunisia, the French Institute of Tunisia, the Embassy of France in Tunisia, the Tunisia Foundation for the Development, and the Union Bancaire pour le Commerce et l’Industrie. Convergences also benefited from the technical support of We Love Sousse, Lab’Ess, the City of Culture, and the Opera Theater.

2020 PUBLICATION

The publication entitled “SSE in action for a 3Zero Tunisia” published in 2020 offers an overview of the SSE sector in Tunisia, reviews the progress proposed by the framework law, the upheavals caused by the crisis of the Covid-19 and presents in an exclusive way the testimonies and feedback of project leaders with high social and environmental impact.

In addition to the results of the survey on the perception of the SSE in Tunisia, discover the scope of the SSE law and the actors who are at the initiative and concrete solutions to reduce inequalities between regions. Meet social entrepreneurs on the front line during Covid-19 and go even further by thinking about the challenges of Tech4Good: when technological innovation serves the common good.[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ z_index_tablet=”500″ text_text_shadow_horizontal_length_tablet=”0px” text_text_shadow_vertical_length_tablet=”0px” excerpt.rendered: The 5th edition of the Convergences Tunisie 3ZÉRO Forum “Sustainability and social well-being at the heart of development” provided an opportunity to deepen the thinking behind the four previous Forums for a Tunisia with a growing and sustainable economy. This unique forum provided an opportunity to equip stakeholders by offering a series of conferences and […]
